value: An orgy of pleasure (sex, food, dance, music).
Sacred hymns or prayers for days without ceasing.
Occupying a sacred nexus point during an astrological confluence.
A pilgrimage to a sacred place or being in the deathlands.
A pilgrimage to a sacred place or being in the sea.
A group vision / dream-quest via essences, drugs or meditation.
A reenactment of a sacred event.
